title: Nangaai- o mama mama lyrics - Engeyum kadhal song lyrics
stanzas:
Singer: Richard, Rahul Nambiar, Naveen Madava
Song: Nangaai
Lyrics: Vaali

Valliye chakaravalliye
Malliye sandhana malliye
Balliye bangana balliye
Oh Mama Mama Vip-paamalaama

Mandaakini, manganani
Sinthaamani, vaa vaa amsaveni
E-pournami, maa-rathini
